General.Name: Yongji Printing Co Ltd
General.Description: GuiZhouYongJi Printing Co.,Ltd engages in the packaging and printing business in China and Australia. The company offers support services for cigarette materials, such as cigarette boxes and wrapping papers. It also engages in the paper packaging design, plate making, gravure and offset printing, laser transfer printing, hot stamping, holographic anti-counterfeiting, and other printing processes. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Guiyang, China.
General.Address: No. 198, Guanshan East Road, Guiyang, China
